description:
Join our team at a leading customer service provider that values dedication and excellence. We're a part of a family of companies committed to delivering top-notch solutions across North America. With a rich history of serving over 10,000 satisfied clients, we pride ourselves on processing over 125 million interactions yearly. We're passionate about optimizing customer experiences and providing tailored contact management solutions.

Summary Of Position

We're seeking remote customer-oriented service representatives to deliver exceptional support to our clients. As a part of our team, you'll engage with customers daily, making outbound calls, and ensuring each interaction is documented accurately. Integrity, professionalism, and adherence to company policies are paramount.

Job Duties

Typing and data entry

Upselling products and services

Setting appointments in a business-to-customer format

Maintaining awareness of campaign products, services, and promotions

Required Skills And Qualifications

Minimum one year of Call Center experience with automatic dialers and call scripting

Clear, professional, and friendly communication skills

Strong People Skills And Active Listening Abilities

Outstanding attendance and punctuality

Sales Experience Preferred

High School diploma or GED

Basic computer literacy

Experience in an Outbound environment

Work From Home Requirements

PC/laptop with at least Windows 10

Hard-wired high-speed internet connection (ethernet cable)

USB-connected headset

Webcam

Quiet, dedicated workspace free from distractions

We offer competitive compensation and benefits, with opportunities for growth and development. Join us in providing exceptional customer service and making a positive impact every day.

Employment Type: Full-Time
